episodes.synopsis: Shrek celebrates Halloween with his friends, Puss in Boots is sent on a mission to recover a stolen ruby, and the gang competes in a singing contest.
episodes.title: Play All Three: Shrek's Swamp Stories

episodes.synopsis: When Halloween arrives, Shrek challenges the gang to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle telling spooky stories.
episodes.title: Scared Shrekless

episodes.synopsis: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers, he is enlisted to recover a priceless ruby stolen by the notorious villain known as the Whisperer.
episodes.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos

episodes.synopsis: Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away kingdom battle it out in a singers' showdown.
episodes.title: Far Far Away Idol

video.title: DreamWorks Shrek's Swamp Stories
video.synopsis: Shrek celebrates Halloween, Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers, and the gang participates in a kingdom-wide singing competition.
